description: They forced hospital staff in Naples to attend a 16-year-old with a minor knee sprain, doctors say.
title: Italian teenagers force ambulance staff to treat friend
title_page: Italian teenagers force ambulance staff to treat friend - BBC News
maintext: According to the Facebook report (in Italian), the ambulance staff explained to those at the scene that the boy's injury was not serious, but were then threatened again for refusing to transport him to hospital.
